name: CXC
description:
「A short ~2-3 minute game about your average Californian. 」

Voicelines were done by「Toxous」-- https://twitter.com/toxous

All other assets, except for sounds & textures were originally created by me. 

If the WebGL is not working with your device, feel free to join my server and let me know: https://discord.gg/nRKe6rYGNJ
